entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:31 a.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this afternoon then snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
